name: Kompas Hotel Aalborg
description: Brand new rooms in the heart of Aalborg You could hardly wish for a better location in Aalborg - whether you are on an extended weekend, city break, business trip or something else entirely. Kompas Hotel, BW Signature Collection is a charming hotel, centrally located in relation to Aalborg's new and exciting waterfront with Musikkens Hus, and the cozy pedestrian streets and vibrant life of the North Jutland capital are just around the corner. You must experience the newly renovated waterfront with world-class architecture, cozy parks, gourmet restaurants in former warehouses while enjoying the view of the Limfjord. Shopping opportunities are plentiful in Aalborg, where one of the pedestrian streets is only 5 minutes away from the hotel on foot. So, explore Aalborg, where you'll always find new places, different experiences, exciting stories and true city vibes. The capital of North Jutland is a gem that never disappoints and an ideal destination for a mini-break or a weekend break.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Scheelsminde
description: This quiet, family-owned property, set in a country house from the early 1800s, is 5 minutes’ drive from Aalborg Train Station. It offers a gourmet restaurant, wellness centre and rooms with flat-screen TVs. Wi-Fi and parking are free. Tea/coffee facilities, cable TV channels and desks are standard at Hotel Scheelsminde. Blackout curtains and a private bathroom with shower are also included. Restaurant Scheelsminde’s seasonal menu offers classic Danish and international dishes from Monday until Saturday. Guests can relax on the terrace or play boules in the garden. The wellness centre features a swimming pool, hot tub and sauna. Kunsten Museum of Modern Art is a 10-minute drive from Hotel Scheelsminde. Mariendals Mølle Bus Stop is just around the corner from the hotel.
